descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**NEW UPDATE**

Get ready to lace up in style—your new Hockey+ mansion just dropped!
This update brings a cozy, nostalgic twist to your mini hockey mayhem:

🔥 New Mansion Environment

Basement Rink: Underground games hit differently.

Deck Hockey: Bring the battle outdoors!

Garage Nets: Two nets right out front—perfect for those classic driveway shootouts.

Chalet Vibes: A warm, wood-trimmed cabin feel where hockey never sleeps.

🏟️ Still Includes 3 Full-Size Arenas
Compete solo or with friends in both competitive and casual modes, now with more variety than ever.

Whether you're ripping shots in the basement or recreating that golden-hour slapshot on the deck, this is the ultimate Canadian hockey dream.

Hockey+ VR is the biggest online hockey experience in the world—no joke, eh? Whether you're hitting the ice for intense 99-player lobbies or kicking back with friends in one of our many arenas, this game has everything a hockey fan could dream of and more.

And it doesn't stop there. Hockey+ VR immerses you in the vibe with live video feeds from Toronto, festive Christmas webcams, and a real-time hockey news feed to keep you in the loop. This isn’t just a game—it’s a celebration of hockey culture.

Whether you’re skating, passing, scoring, or just chilling with friends, Hockey+ VR is your ultimate hockey destination. Grab your stick, hit the ice, and give 'er, eh! It’s as Canadian as it gets.
